title: Gold ring with one of the earliest depictions of Jesus Christ found in ancient shipwreck
content:
1. Gold ring with one of the earliest depictions of Jesus Christ found in ancient shipwreck  USA TODAY
  2. 1,700-year-old coins, Jesus ‘Good Shepherd’ ring, found in shipwrecks off Caesarea  The Times of Israel

  4. Centuries-old Good Shepherd ring recovered from shipwrecks off Israel  Reuters
